azureLogAnalytics.query:
availabilityResults
| extend percentage = toint(success) * 100
| summarize avg(percentage) by bin(timestamp, 5m)

panels.title: Cpu usages by credit api replica
Cpu usages by booking processor replica

azureLogAnalytics.query:
availabilityResults
| where notempty(duration)
| extend availabilityResult_duration = iif(itemType == 'availabilityResult', duration, todouble(''))
| summarize durationPerLocation=sum(availabilityResult_duration) / sum(itemCount) by bin(timestamp, 5m), location
| evaluate pivot(location, sum(durationPerLocation))
| order by timestamp desc
